title: QA Engineer - HCM
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH PHÁT TRIỂN HỆ THỐNG NICHIETSU
job_description:
Full QA process ownership (write a ticket > design & estimate > implement > deliver )
Participation in design meetings to advocate for the QA perspective.
Detailed bug tickets (reproduction steps, tech details, stack traces)
Punch IN OUT during work day
Be available via slack during work day
Each product, module , feature should be qa covered
Pass every Performance review
Maintenance of ci/cd pipelines
requirements:
We are looking for an experienced QA engineer that is able to learn by himself, a good team
player with a fluent English, and a deep knowledge of WEB-related technologies. Main
programming language should be python, knowledge of JS and \ or GO is a good bonus.
Minimum set of required technologies \ tools:
WEB-related techs (HTTP requests \ responses, security related topics like CORS)
Any experience with hardware vendors is a big bonus.
Selenium \ Cucumber (behave)
CI\CD (Azure DevOps \ Github Actions \ Gitlab)
Pytest \ TestNg
Kubernetes (Define pod \ start pod \ modify pod)
Load testing (e.g. Locust)
Pentesting (metasploit) - Bonus
Linux Configuration \ Operation
AWS \ Azure
SQL queries proficient
Observability tools - any of Grafana stack, OpenTelemetry, Prometheus, Splunk, Jaeger, Zipkin,
Elastic, AWS X-Ray, etc.
